title: JavaScript Syntax
details: Explore the basic syntax of JavaScript, including variables, functions, and operators.

message: Create a Simple Calculator in JavaScript
title: Calculator
details: Build a simple calculator app that can add, subtract, multiply, and divide numbers.

title: Loops & Conditionals
details: Create a program that uses loops and conditionals to print the multiplication table for a number.

title: Arrays & Objects
details: Learn how to store and manipulate data using arrays and objects in JavaScript.

message: Create a Todo List in React
title: React Todo List
details: Build a simple Todo List application in React where users can add, edit, and delete tasks.

title: JSX Syntax
details: Understand how JSX works in React and how to write JavaScript code inside HTML-like structures.

message: Build a Counter App in React
title: Counter App
details: Create a simple counter app that increments and decrements the counter using React state.

message: Learn How to Handle Events in React
title: Event Handling in React
details: Learn how to handle events such as clicks, form submissions, and input changes in React.

title: React Form
details: Build a basic form using React with controlled components for input handling.

message: Learn State and Props in React
title: State & Props in React
details: Learn the difference between state and props in React and how they are used to manage data.

title: React Lifecycle
details: Explore React lifecycle methods like `componentDidMount` and `componentWillUnmount` for managing side effects.

message: Build a Simple Weather App with React
title: Weather App
details: Create a weather app that fetches data from a weather API and displays the current weather for a selected city.

message: Learn About JavaScript Functions and Scope
title: JavaScript Functions
details: Understand how functions work in JavaScript and the concept of function scope.

message: Create a Shopping Cart in React
title: Shopping Cart
details: Build a simple shopping cart application where users can add items to the cart and view the total price.

title: Timer App
details: Create a timer app using React that can start, pause, and reset a timer.
